profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.

form.username_desc: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym. You can only change this once every 30 days.
form.email_desc: You can manage verified email addresses in your email settings
form.bio_desc: You can @mention other users and organizations to link to them.
form.urls_desc: Add links to your website, blog, or social media profiles.

account.title: Account
account.description: Update your account settings. Set your preferred language and timezone.

form.name: Name
form.name_desc: This is the name that will be displayed on your profile and in emails.
form.dob_desc: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age.
form.lang_desc: This is the language that will be used in the app.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.

form.font_desc: Set the font you want to use in the app.
form.theme_desc: Select the theme for the app.
form.layout_desc: Select the layout for the navigation.
form.primary_color_desc: Select the color for the app.
form.radius_desc: Select the radius for the app.

form.comm_email_desc: Receive emails about your account activity.
form.market_email_desc: Receive emails about new products, features, and more.
form.security_email_desc: Receive emails about your account activity and security.
form.mobile_setting: Use different settings for my mobile devices
form.mobile_setting_desc: You can manage your mobile notifications in the mobile settings page

display.title: Display
display.description: Turn items on or off to control what's displayed in the app.

form.sidebar_desc: Select the items you want to display in the sidebar.
